issues.description: The problem specification and UML diagram require getNumberOfStudentsPerTutor() to return a double, but the solution implementation defines it as returning an int. This mismatch will cause student code to fail the expected tests and prevents accurate fractional results.
issues.suggested_fix: Change the solution method signature to public double getNumberOfStudentsPerTutor() and perform a double division, for example: return (double) getTotalNumberOfStudents() / getNumberOfTutors();
